title: [Medicine] Risk of viral airborne transmission peaks within 5 seconds of face-to-face encounters. To reduce the risk of viral infection, interrupting inhalation, maintaining a physical distance of at least 1 m, and positioning oneself upwind, may be effective within 5 seconds of face-to-face encounters.
